parameters.query:
UPDATE variaveis_globais_n8n
SET valor_variavel = CASE 
    WHEN id = 16 THEN '{{$json["id_token"] }}'
    WHEN id = 15 THEN '{{ $json["access_token"] }}'
    WHEN id = 13 THEN '{{ $json["refresh_token"] }}'
END
WHERE id IN (16, 15, 13);
